name: Seppuku
description:
Small game made for Weekly Jam 130 in the last 2 days  :P . Made with Unity.

This is our first game jam! woohoo!

Note: We are planning to update the game after the jam, make the levels more interesting.

Story:

The ninja killed himself many a time and somehow consistently failed to end his life, but when the final katana pierced his body the ninja was finally able to restore his honor, and rest in peace. 

You must find the katana  to advance to the next level.

Art by :  MalyFostery, stacksta

Story and Music by : Daddy_Dex

Programming by : stacksta, Riiuko

Inital Concept by: PurpleOJ

Level Design by: MalyFostery:P
